content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for the school bus around 6:30 am in austin texas and it was very cool out and i was sitting looking up at a clear sky and then i saw a bright streak moving from east to west (very fast it only took about two seconds to go from 10:00 to just above tree line to the east and in about two seconds and when i finally locked in on it , it stopped dead in mid air just above the tree line and hovered for about five seconds then descended at a much slower speed , it looked like you punched a hole in the sky , like a fluorescent bright light no glare , it went from light to black  on the edge of it , about the size of a dime at arms length , i knew this was something different now because i've seen aircraft the shuttle fly over shooting stars meteors and comets  and this was way faster , i could not tell depth on the object very well but it was a good ways off from what i could tell , i was about 13 at the time and before seeing star wars , im really glad i did this and finally told you, thank you for your time. william hanson
content.summary: Around 6:30 am sitting waiting on school bus looking up and saw a streak of bright solid fluorescent  ball  come from west to east at a very great speed  and stopped dead just above tree line and after about five seconds it descended from a dead stop .

content.detailedDescription: I was in cottage grove or charging my phone outside the goodwill waiting for my girlfriend to pick me up. i saw an object flying slow ahead. i noticed that it was silent and the colors of the lights were odd. at first i thought it was a plane but it made a strange 90 degree turn and started flashing brilliant colors. its started to fly south away from me and i unplugged my phone and took footage of the object. it flew up, down, left, right, and even diagonal. i got it all on film. i was very happy to get the footage about 15 minutes of the objects flight patterns and colors. after about 17 minutes from when i spotted it the lights faded out. feel free to contact me i got some great footage you should see. i do not want to just post the film you have to contact me if you want to see it. thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cone,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Maney different colors...I have footage!! flying up, down, diagonal, as if it were servayin the area.

content.detailedDescription: 5 miles north of port st lucie fl sevice plaza on fl turnpike i was on north side it was heading south paralell to road.When i fist saw it hovering changing colors brite white,blue,red,red yellow orange like about 2 miles ahead flashing colors for 4 min then lights dimed it moved south very slow 5 mph passed by me no sound disk shape 75 to 100 yards wide dark color rotating dimed lights on bottom. if you want to hear the hole event you may call me.
content.summary: Awsome

content.detailedDescription: I was at my condo's pool laying down soaking the sun about 10 am facing west.  i noticed bright lights up in the sky and thought they were airplanes at first.  there were 2 bright star-like objects against a dark blue sky ( i was wearing polaroid glasses that darkened the sky).  objects were bigger than normal stars, almost like a bright morning star.  the apparent distance between the 2 of them, was similar to the distance between castor and pollux (the 2 bright stars in the twin (gemini) constellation).  they were steadily moving in a nw path and would seem to vary speed slightly slow down or speed up) and come closer and then move apart from each other.  i kept taking my glasses off to see if i was seeing things but they were still there. i watched them for about 15 minutes and then they disappeared in the distance.  i don't know what it was.....But remember seeing something similar in the gila wilderness about 20 years ago.  that time was 3 objects and were moving erratically then they disappeared....4 days later we heard a vibrating sound overhead, my wife was 5 months pregnant, after that, she started miscarrying and had to take her to the hospital.  she almost died, doctor never found fetus....She thinks "they took it".
content.summary: 2 star-like objects (a llittle bigger) moving together mosthly in straight line n-nm at time they would vary speed and come closer to each other.  disappeared after about 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: We where on mahoning ave in austintown ohio and the corner of 46 we look to the left in the sky and saw at least 8 objects in the sky to the left then seeen four more come out from behind the tree line some where flying really close others further apart the was alot of other traffic on the road as well i had my window down pointing at the sky they where sloid red light and the lights made the craft look like they where round they where up pretty high and a few where moving faster than the others. the first thing i thought when i seen theses things was that there are way to many and they are way to close to each other to be planes some where moving and othere where standing still. i litterly asked my wife five time wtf is that others in the area seen it too because they had the same reaction as i didi did call local tv station and ask if they had any other calls they said no we lost sight of the object when we turned right on 46 toward canfield i wanted to try to get photo or vidoe with smart phone but it was to dark out side to get it to picv up the objects on my screen the objects did have a weird pattern they where in in the sky my daugther had also seen theses but she is to young to tell you what she seen
content.summary: Swaw at least 10 light in sky over austintown ohio

content.detailedDescription:
On aug 13th about 520am appeared in the sky to the ne of my view. traveling in a straight line above the ground about 100-200 feet
the object was moving west at a level and straight line.

i observed it for about 45 seconds and it was out of my sight.

i was driving west bound and it was to my left about a 1/2 mile away.

it was observed by the passager in my caqr also

it did  appear to be a metior but it was traveling east to west in a straight line. if it was a metior it would have made a huge inpact, but none was seen or heard.
content.summary: Appered to be a object ,round and engulfed in  a fireball.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my girlfriend driving for walmart down what i'm thining was 6th street maybe and i looked up and my girlfriend made a remark kind like wooooah what is that and i said i don't know but by the time i i could finshedbit flew back behind the treesnd i sped up but couldn't see it after that. i then witnessed this same phenomenon less that 10 miles from the same place on my from work one night astound the same time and was driving to my house and saw the same yellowish orb near a baseball field  and by the time i saw it it shot to the left then straght and to the right at an angle and i was completly speechless and my phone range because a girl i worked with called me to ask me what it was cause she was freaking out
content.summary: Round yellow orb very fast and not load

content.detailedDescription: It was around 2am, while my girlfriend was driving home we noticed something in the sky. at first we didnt think much of it because there are sometimes helicopters flying in the area. but what caught our attention was that the object appeared to be low to the ground, right above tree tops and had no sound coming from it. usually helicopters make a lot of noise so we were both very surprised and stunned at the same time. we looked right at it as it hovered slowly aboved us with a few lights blinking. i told my girlfriend to turn around so we can take a picture of it and as we were turning it just took off with an amazing speed, and it was gone just like that.
content.summary: Silent / fast

content.detailedDescription: Was a kid at the time, mid 50's period, attending beardsley elementary school.  we were on playground and someone said, "hey, look at that", and we turned and looked to see 3+ silvery objects hovering off in the west, sort of traveling east.  they suddenly made a sharp right turn.  while doing so, a teacher ordered us to get back inside the school, but i continued to watch as i walked and the objects made swift movement west and disappeared.  all were flying together in a pattern.  it was the talk of the school for a few days.  i don't know if the incident made the papers because i didn't read papers as a child.  i know that during the 1950's there were many similar sightings in california.  we had edwards afb east of us, but they had nothing like this and they were coming from that direction and actually turned and went the other way.  i've often thought of trying to advertise the event and see if any of my fellow students would agree they had seen it.
content.summary: Several of us kids on school playground & teachers observed. teache4rs made us go into school (beardsley)

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on our sundeck with relatives.....Noticed it when came w over the hills from the nwwe knew what we thought it was....A...Ufo...It went in a straight line and out of our line of vision in the se...I have seen many and we felt vindicated seeing this with 4 witness
content.summary: Looked like a depiction of a "freighter" of a star wars movie...

content.detailedDescription: I captured this image on my game camera and it's the same image shown on nbc news this morning from naples florida. that image is shown hovering over a swimming pool with lights. the image i have also has a light in the middle and looks the same as the naples image. my image is not video it's a still image.
content.summary: I have this image captured on my game camera

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in my hot tub with a friend.   i noticed around 10pm two bright lights moving across the sky in tandem.  at first i thought the light was a satellite before i observed the rear light.   the object moved across the big dipper that gave us some perspective of the size.  it appeared cigar shaped and moved at a slow rate across the sky.  the lights were non pulsating.  i grabbed my cell phone and attempted to record the event.   but the recording was too dark.  we lost sight of the object after passing over the house.   my friend and i were in awe of the event that took place.
content.summary: Observed very large object heading east in appleton wisconsin.   object had 2 lights, one on the front and back.

content.detailedDescription: The object was moving very fast for its height, then and only once there was a very bright flash and kept going.
content.summary: Bright flash

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i went fishing at my wifes cousins house less than 1/4 mile from my house. we live in the country and our family owns most of the property around our house and where we was fishing. my cousin and i had been fishing for about 20 minutes without a bit. as we was talking i noticed something out of my left eye. my first thought when i saw the light is. what the hell is someone doing in the woods lighting off chinese lanterns. then i realized where the light lifted out of the woods its to dense for a lantern to have made it through the canopy of the woods. i asked my cousin what it was. he remarked i dont know and i dont want to know. we both concluded it wasnt a lantern. it raised out of the woods in a zig zag patern. very slowly, no sound what so ever. the only sounds you could hear that night was the highway about 3/4s of mile away from where we was at. i told my cousin we needed more people to see it. so i turned to run towards the house to get my wifes cousin and her 2 daughters. as i turned my cousin yelled. the object stoped moving and was now just floating over the woods. and was not moving. the light was pulsing very slowly. i hammered on the back door of the house. they all 3 came to the door i franticly pointed and told them it had just lifted out of the woods. ill never forget the look on the moms face. she was not shocked at all, just scared. she said " we dont mess with it, and we are not coming outside" i said you see it right? she replied yes and they went inside. as i started walking back to my cousin who was still by the pond gathering his things. it slowly started making its way south southwest towards my best guess would be gas city, in. we watched it untill it was out of site. we went back to my house and told my wife. she naturally didnt belive us. she called her cousin and they verified our story. twenty minutes after arriving at my house and telling my wife. the a-10s started flying over our house. breaking east just south of our house, not thier typical flight path from what we see. and i told my wife i thought it was kinda late for them to be doing a night training flight. i was an aviation electrician in the navy for 5 years working on f/a-18c. a-10s fly over our house from the airforce base in fort wayne, in often. this was nothing i had ever saw in my time in the service or out of the service. it had no port or starboard green and red lights. the only thing that even resembled an aircraft was the slow pulsing red light. that i said was similar to an anti collision light on human aircraft. i had never saw anything like it until that august. i and 100 percent certain it was not a man made aircraft, weather balloon, or anything of that nature. it wasnt carried away by the breeze. it was very clear out that night with alot of stars out. my wifes cousin sees the light over the woods often. i havent saw it since that night. but thats because i will not be outside at night at her house.
content.summary: Light floated up out of woods then took direct path toward larger town

content.detailedDescription:
Well a day later and here i am again with another sighting! needing smokes for the morning i thought i would run out and get them before bed so i did not have to in the morning before work. my truck was parked out on the road , when i got into my truck i went to start the truck it was facing in the west direction before i put in the keys i looked straight ahead and seen 2 very,very,very low bright lights.

i thought here we go again, i got out of my truck and then realized there was a 3rd bright light on the top forming a triangle. i had my cell phone on me so i decided to film it, i was only able to film about a min as my cell phone is not the best and can only hold so much video and most of it is taken up of videos of my little boy!  

in the video in the top right corner of your screen you will see a orange light .This is the street light..You will see 2 white lights to the left a bit and oddly enough the way it looks because of how low it was it almost looks like the lights are below the street light. then in between and up on the 2 bottom lights you will see the 3rd light forming a triangle. after my video ends about 30 seconds later they disappear.
content.summary: 3 orbs forming a triangle

content.detailedDescription: Many people pulled over i seen at least 5 cars and a2 people walking on the side walk. the formation appeared out of no where. we were driving east bounty on hidden valley drive and our left side we see a red glow, my son is going nuts dad what is that what is that!! we turn and look and there a formation in a single line about 20 + orbs like in triangle formation. one by one they the light dims and fades to the ski till you can't see it any more. they where visible for about a good 75 seconds but i is not record as much a i thought i did not press record only till the very end. other people were recording i hope they post it up.  call me up i will give you as many details as possible.
content.summary: Multiple cars pulled over a formations of over 20 in triangle pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife saw the first object with other witnesses. she said that the object was bright white or like a bright light. it traveled from the direction of tel aviv toward jerusalem. it stopped in flight and descended into a grove of trees and then flew straight up and out of sight.

about five minutes later my son in-law called me out to the porch adjacent to the porch where my wife witnessed the first light. we were recording my radio show, opposing the matrix. the light i saw was red and pulsated or blinked twice then stopped blinking. it too traveled the direction as if from tel aviv toward jerusalem. about half way across the sky (almost directly in front of our field of view) the object blinked out, then reappeared for a brief second and then blinked out completely.

i am familiar with aircraft and know their lighting patterns. i looked for other lights that might have been with the red light but there were none. it was going too slow to be a meteor and it was not a satellite. i have been a star gazer my entire life and i know satellites when i see them. also, i am a former mufon investigator and i know what to look for and how to discern what i see.
content.summary: Two different objects observed by my wife and myself plus other witnesses

content.detailedDescription: On the night of tuesday, august 6, 2013, while my wife and i were watching television, my cocker spaniel, parker, wanted to go out to our back yard.  it was at 9:15 p.M. pacific standard time.  i let him out and looked up at the sky and told my wife that the sky was clear and many stars could be seen.  i noticed a particular "star"  that was overhead that was really bright and seemed larger than the rest.  my dog wandered around the yard and i continued observing the night sky.  i called my wife to come look at the stars which she did.  we both saw the bright star overhead as it remained in place.  then it began to move to the east and it surprised me and i mentioned it to my wife.  i then indicated that it had no blinking red, green, or white lights like an aircraft.  she noticed that also and commented on it that that was strange.  we followed the light as it moved to the east and at no time did it diminish in brightness.  no blinking strobe likes like on an airplane were ever seen.  my wife and i remarked that we had viewed our first ufo, perhaps. at this point we entered our hose with our dog.  i looked at the clock on our tv recorder and it showed 9:18 so the whole incident took about 3 minutes.
content.summary: My wife and i first sighted object overhead.  appeared to be a star but larger and brightest in the sky.  was not moving. object began to move to the east.  it never showed any blinking lights like an aircraft. glowed brightly until out of view.

content.detailedDescription: Winnipeg, mb canada, august 8 2013 23:15 observed two lights, the leading light was solid white with the following light a dimmer solid red light. these 2 lights were at a altitude that a international jet would travel. but the distance between the two lights, which were consistantly the same distance apart, was much too large.
content.summary: One large glowing light and one red light behind it, but the red light was at a distance that it would not be airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to take a quick walk. at first i noticed there were lightning like flashes going on in various parts of the sky. took a look at a weather map on my phone, and there is no precipitation. when i looked up again, i noticed a white orb that appeared stationary at first, but i quickly noticed that it was moving. the object was a white star like orb that was not making any noise, and was slightly pulsating. the object appeared to be moving through the sky as an insect would in small s-like patterns. the flight path was straight, but there were definitely directional changes. object then appeared to stop, but this may have been an illusion from the object moving away from me. all the while the lightning like flashes were occurring in different parts of the sky, and again, there is no storms in the area! i felt very strange as i watched this object, but this may be due to the fact that this is my first sighting :) very very strange indeed. 

i put two as the witnesses for this entry since i text my aunt to tell her, and she said that she saw the same thing!
content.summary: Pulsating orb

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were outside our apartment complex for our nightly cigarette break. while sitting on the park bench in the yard we were looking at the night sky as we always do when there is no cloud cover. i happened to look over to the left of our building (to the north) and noticed a bright white light that would dim down to almost invisible and then brighten back up to a brightness that was beyond a typical aircraft. i pointed it out to my boyfriend as it had no apparent pattern when zooming in and out of brightness, which i thought was odd. my grandfather flew helicopters for a living so my father expressed interest in every plane or helicopter that flew over and regularly took me to airshows when i was young. we live near an airport, and growing up we had planes flying low over our house all the time as they were coming in for a landing but i had never seen lights like that on a plane, jet or helicopter before. it started rising upward over the tree line, and as it did so i noticed another light just like it diagonally underneath it. it continued to rise just a little bit more, then headed in a northwest direction. as it lifted fully over the tree line i noticed there was a third light, but unlike the first two white lights this one was bright red. the three lights formed a perfect triangle in the sky and we noticed as it flew it never lost its perfect formation, unlike when multiple planes are in the sky and one will catch up to another or go in a different direction. the three lights were also all the same size, which led us to believe they were all in the same general area. the lights continued to zoom in and out of brightness with no apparent pattern. it seemed as though the three lights were attached to a large aircraft. if so, the aircraft itself was not visible, but there is no way that the lights would have held that perfect form unless they were all stationary and attached to something much larger. the size of the triangle itself was comparable to that of the big dipper constellation's two bottom stars forming a triangle with one of the top stars. we watched it cross the sky at a fairly quick speed before disappearing behind the building to the northwest of us. there was a plane that flew over our building to land before we saw the lights and there were also two or three that landed while we tried to see if the lights would show up anywhere else in the sky, however it did not reappear. it was far too low and going in the wrong direction for it to be a plane or jet coming in for a landing. we did not notice if any other aircraft were in the area while we were observing it due to the fact that our eyes were glued to it.
content.summary: 3 lights forming a triangle over treeline horizon

content.detailedDescription: We had a campfire in our backyard. when the fire was out, myself and my husband and son started star gazing for a minute before going into the house for the evening. all of a sudden this very bright circular object appeared above the tree tops and just hovered above. the object did not look far away and what struck me was how bright it remained. within 30 seconds the object headed silently over our wooded area and disappeared at a fast rate. today, august 8th i noticed on the internet, articles and pictures not far from where we live, of other sightings on or around the same date we saw the object. i was astounded to see the photos where identical to what we had seen on august 6th 2013. i can't believe it! other's in my area have seen the same object.
content.summary: Object was circular in shape and very bright, florecent like, hovered, then disappeared very fast, silently

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my yard taking random pictures of the clear night sky.I have a cannon digital powershot a3300is.16.0 mega pixels.I took about a a dozen or so pictures,then i caught a picture of 2 objects in the night sky.One is a white round object and the other looked like a bright red orb.The orb seemed to be in front of the round white object.I did not see this with my naked eyes.It just showed up in the picture.I took several more pictures in the same direction about 50-55 degrees up the horizon.It was shot at 11;41 pm.The time on the camera was one hour off because i never reset it.The moon did not come up until approximately 1:30 am in the opposite direction from where i took the pic.So the bright round object was not the moon.The moon when it did show up was not full.The white object is clearly round.The bright red orb seemed to be closer than the white one.In all i took about 50-60 pictures and nothing else showed up.This was july 28,2013 at 11:41pm.I was and still am a little shook up about it,seeing it appeared so close to me.I have no software or any kind of trickery to produce this.Truthfully i am a computer misfit.I only know the basics,finding websites,e-mail ect.I have gone out several other nights and nothing showed up except little white orbs all in my trees.All different sizes.I dont know what they are either.So,thats my story and im sticking to it.
content.summary: Shot with digital camera.Shooting night sky.Did not see with eyes.Randomly shooting sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Taking pictures of coastline on way home from big sur.
did not see the ufo when the picturs were taken.
saw them after looking at them on the computer.
i enhanced the pics to see them better.
zoom in to see more detail. 
there are three original pics.
content.summary: 3 pics of ufo from left to right of screen

content.detailedDescription: I was putting my son from one room on main floor to upstairs bedroom.  i was looking west and saw at the tree lines what looked like an orange orb.  at first thought it was an orange japanese lantern.  then when i went upstairs looked out another window looking west and it moved at a faster rate than what i had originally thought and realized that this wasn't a lantern.  put son in his bed and looked out another window over lake lansing looking southward. and it went moving at a very fast motion and went upward into cloud and disappeared out of my sight.
content.summary: Orange orb came from west observed at tree line and the turned south over lake and ascended upward into cloud and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend witnessed the first light in the south west called me out to the back deck where i climbed onto the railing to get a better view... not the wisest, but i was able to see a bright white light descend the hover in place. the light stayed in place for only a few moments then vanished so i climbed down. my girlfriend ran to get her telescope, and she looked around at stars for a few minutes. i started to get weird feelings in my chest. like butterflies. i spoke out loud, and said 'show yourself!' my girlfriend laughed thats when things got strange she heard in my voice answer 'is that what you want?' i don't remember saying this. she just asked me 'what?' which i responded with 'what?' right back. she told me what she heard me say, and thats when i saw what looked like a bright planet in the south east. it came down i took out my cell phone and tried to get it, but it was too shaky. my girlfriend reminded me about my canon dslr so i ran in and grabbed it. unfortunately by that time it was right over the house, and i didnt have time to change the video setting to night white balance, and i didnt have a tripod... so its not the best video, but it shows it was there. it was big, and it was bright.
content.summary: Bright white orbs

content.detailedDescription:
making lunch for my kids and my daughter pointed out two small white ball things (pretty bright!!) twisting and turning round each other over the bay (robinson bay). i thought they wer small planes but they didnt have the lights u usually see and they moved weird!! i seen stuff like this before up home in auckland once but never after i moved to lower hutt 16 years ago!! my kids thought they were birds but they were far up in the clouds and i dont think birds can go that high! 
i googled ufo sitings and this website came up so im posting it here, it's on facebook too! the airport isnt that far from us so we see planes taking off most of the time but these had no sound and to go up into the clouds after a while!
content.summary: White disks over ward island

content.detailedDescription: During the delta 4 launch on the evening of august 7, 2013 i was able to capture 3-4 lights that formed a triangle formation that held formation while the delta 4 released its boosters until the rocket went out of sight.
content.summary: Noticed 3-4 lights in triangle formation during the delta 4 launch

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a star blinking in the night sky many colors. i thought this was unusual so i went inside to grab the camera and see if i could capture what it was doing. it moved suddenly and was blinking elsewhere. i then snapped a picture toward the location and the camera flashed. i was trying to record not take a picture. the camera turned off and would not turn back on. i took the batteries out and put them back in and i try again. when i looked up the blinking star was gone and a glowing solid white color orb was coming down. i then hit the record/picture button and it snapped a photo again and again i was trying to record and again it turned off on me. the batteries i know are good because i had taken them out of the package not to long ago in the week.  after this happened i just watched this solid object that looked like your typical saucer shape object grow a dome from the top of it and turned into what looked like a cloud of television fuzz.A quick burst of white light seemed to light up everything and trails of cloud like tv fuzz was flowing off of it to the lamp post and to the trees. i ran inside to tell the others to come out and it was gone. it left a fuzzy trail in a tornado type up swirl that lasted for about a minute. one thing i am happy about is it is on camera and very unexpected. 

the main reason i am reporting this now is because today i seen a video that shows something very similar to what i witnessed. "shocking ufo caught on surveillance camera in naples florida"... so much of what i see in this video is what i was seeing. they have the video and i have the pic. it might be important. i really wish i did not have to use my name. please do not use my info as i fear being ridiculed. i have long been interested in the world and its a shame that i feel this way.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Star seemed to be blinking many colors then suddenly and swiftly spiraled down above trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was around eight or nine years old.  we lived on a farm on the edge of dartmoor in devon england.  the event took place at around 8 to 10pm maybe later as it was a dark but clear and stary night. we had come out of the house and were standing in our garden i looked up and noticed the black diamond shaped craft it was travelling slowly about the same speed as a low earth orbiting satellite incidently the two lights were the size of a satellite there was no sound as i remember it the size of the craft would be equal to the size and length of my thumb if held up in the air.  we all witnessed it, my mother, her boyfriend and my brother.  the craft was travelling from north to south in a straight line it seemed to be very high up and very large.  blacker than the night sky and blocking out the light from the stars above it as it moved accros the sky.  the shape was equal in its geometry being slightly longer in its length.  the light on the back point was slightly brighter than the light on the front point.  on questioning my mother on the subject recently, she remembers a light going up and joining the craft but i do not remember this happening.  i remember the object disapearing in the distance my memory of the incadent is vivid but not of what we were doing before or after. this all took place in 1978/9 and this is the first time we have talked of it outside of the family.
content.summary: Black diamond shape blacker than the night sky, small light on forward and aft points aft light slightly brighter
